attributes.action: Make sure there are more child protection laws in place. Namely with Haringey Council Child Services!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the recent admission that Baby P had been murdered by his mother, her boyfriend & their lodger Haringey Council have alot to answer for. This is the second huge case in a short time where they have sat aside & let another child be tortured & killed by their carers (the first was Victoria Climbie 8 years ago).
More laws need to be put in place for Child Services, more needs to be done to protect these young, innocent children from further abuse & in the worst case, death.
We urge the Prime Minister to look into this & do something about this problem which it seems will only get worse over time.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
